content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
-  Make sure the pipe connection exists before attempting to connect
-  Ensure the pipe connection does not already exist before attempting to connect

### Errors when using offshore pump
-  Ensure the offshore pump has a valid fluid box and connection points

### Errors when using boiler
-  Ensure the boiler has a valid fuel source and connection points

### Errors when using steam engine
-  Ensure the steam engine has a valid input liquid and connection points

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place
-  Ensure the entity can be placed at the specified position before attempting to place

### Errors when using burner mining drill
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has a valid fuel source before attempting to mine
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has a valid drop position and neighbours before attempting to mine

### Errors when using furnace
-  Ensure the furnace has a valid fuel source and ingredients before attempting to smelt
-  Ensure the furnace has a valid drop position and neighbours before attempting to smelt

### Errors when using lab
-  Ensure the lab has a valid input and output before attempting to research
-  Ensure the lab has a valid power source before attempting to research

### Errors when using inserter
-  Ensure the inserter has a valid pickup and drop position before attempting to insert
-  Ensure the inserter has a valid fuel source before attempting to insert

### Errors when using chest
-  Ensure the chest has a valid inventory and drop position before attempting to store or retrieve items

### Errors when using small electric pole
-  Ensure the small electric pole has a valid connection points and voltage before attempting to connect
-  Ensure the small electric pole has a valid position and neighbours before attempting to connect

### Errors when using pipe group
-  Ensure the pipe group has a valid fluid system and pipes before attempting to connect
-  Ensure the pipe group has a valid position and connection points before attempting to connect

### Errors when using electricity group
-  Ensure the electricity group has a valid poles and voltage before attempting to connect
-  Ensure the electricity group has a valid position and connection points before attempting to connect
